SELECT sp_no, sc_no, sp_nm, sp_price, sp_apv_yn, sp_total_yn, sp_shoot_type, sp_image, regdate, updatedate, sc_nm, sc_addr FROM (SELECT sp.sp_no sp_no, sp.sc_no sc_no, sp.sp_nm sp_nm, sp.sp_price sp_price, sp.sp_apv_yn sp_apv_yn, sp.sp_total_yn sp_total_yn, sp.sp_shoot_type sp_shoot_type, sp.sp_image sp_image, TO_CHAR(sp.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, TO_CHAR(sp.updatedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') updatedate, sc.sc_nm sc_nm, sc.sc_addr sc_addr FROM studio_product sp join studio_company sc ON sp.sc_no = sc.sc_no) WHERE (sc_addr LIKE #{location} || '%') AND (sp_price BETWEEN #{minCost} AND #{maxCost}) AND
sp_shoot_type = #{option}
${option} = 'y'
ORDER BY updatedate DESC

SELECT dp_no, dc_no, dp_nm, dp_price, dp_style, dp_image, regdate, updatedate, dc_nm, dc_addr FROM (SELECT dp.dp_no dp_no, dp.dc_no dc_no, dp.dp_nm dp_nm, dp.dp_price dp_price, dp.dp_style dp_style, dp.dp_image dp_image, TO_CHAR(dp.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, TO_CHAR(dp.updatedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') updatedate, dc.dc_nm dc_nm, dc.dc_addr dc_addr FROM dress_product dp join dress_company dc ON dp.dc_no = dc.dc_no) WHERE (dc_addr LIKE #{location} || '%') AND (dp_price BETWEEN #{minCost} AND #{maxCost}) AND LOWER(dp_style) IN
LOWER(#{option})
ORDER BY updatedate DESC

SELECT mp_no, mc_no, mp_nm, mp_price, mp_acc_yn, mp_family_yn, mp_hair_yn, mp_image, regdate, updatedate, mc_nm, mc_addr FROM (SELECT mp.mp_no mp_no, mp.mc_no mc_no, mp.mp_nm mp_nm, mp.mp_price mp_price, mp.mp_acc_yn mp_acc_yn, mp.mp_family_yn mp_family_yn, mp.mp_hair_yn mp_hair_yn, mp. mp_image mp_image, TO_CHAR(mp.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, TO_CHAR(mp.updatedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') updatedate, mc.mc_nm mc_nm, mc.mc_addr mc_addr FROM makeup_product mp join makeup_company mc ON mp.mc_no = mc.mc_no) WHERE (mc_addr LIKE #{location} || '%') AND (mp_price BETWEEN #{minCost} AND #{maxCost}) AND
LOWER(${option}) = 'y'
ORDER BY updatedate DESC

SELECT mp.mp_no mp_no, mp.mc_no mc_no, mp.mp_nm mp_nm, mp.mp_price mp_price, mp.mp_acc_yn mp_acc_yn, mp.mp_family_yn mp_family_yn, mp.mp_hair_yn mp_hair_yn, mp. mp_image mp_image, TO_CHAR(mp.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, TO_CHAR(mp.updatedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') updatedate, mc.mc_nm mc_nm, mc.mc_addr mc_addr FROM makeup_product mp join makeup_company mc ON mp.mc_no = mc.mc_no
